被.definition: quilt; to cover (with); (literary) to suffer (a misfortune); used to indicate passive voice (placed before the doer of the action like "by" in English passive-voice sentences, or, if the doer is not mentioned, before the verb); (since c. 2009) (sarcastic or jocular) used to indicate that the following word should be regarded as being in air quotes (as in 被旅遊|被旅游[bei4 lu:3you2] to "go on a trip")

被上訴人.definition: appellee (side that won in trial court, whose victory is being appealed by losing side)

被剝削者.definition: person suffering exploitation; the workers in Marxist theory

被單.definition: (bed) sheet; envelope for a padded coverlet; CL:床[chuang2]

被困.definition: to be trapped; to be stranded

被執行人.definition: (law) person required to fulfill obligations set forth in a written court judgement (e.g. to pay compensation to sb)

被套.definition: duvet cover; quilt cover; (finance) to be stuck with an asset that has decreased in value after purchase

被子植物.definition: angiosperm (flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)

被子植物門.definition: angiospermae (phylum of flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)

被指.definition: to be accused of; to be alleged to

被旅遊.definition: (coll.) (of a dissident) to be taken on a tour, ostensibly a vacation, but actually a trip organized by the authorities where one's every move is watched

被爆者.definition: survivor of the atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 被爆者 "hibakusha")

被窩.definition: (traditional bedding) quilt wrapped around the body as a tube; (contemporary) bedding; bed cover

被窩兒.definition: erhua variant of 被窩|被窝[bei4 wo1]

被胎.definition: duvet inner; duvet insert (i.e. a duvet without its cover 被套[bei4tao4]); quilt padding; quilt wadding

被自殺.definition: a death claimed to be a suicide by the authorities

被訪者.definition: respondent (in a survey, questionnaire, study etc)

被迫.definition: to be compelled; to be forced

被選舉權.definition: the right to be elected; the right to stand for election
